rows.label: tlk70000007_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Marco is really into tinkering with
things. He's been pretty busy with a
project lately.

rows.label: tlk70000007_03_msg0002
rows.name:
He won't tell me what it is, though.
He just keeps saying it's for him to
know and for me to find out.

rows.label: tlk70000007_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm sorry... I got a little carried away.
You probably don't want to hear
about a bunch of silly kids like us.

rows.label: tlk70000007_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But, I mean... Don't worry. I'm sure that
whatever Marco is making, it'll be nice.

rows.label: tlk70000007_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I wish I wasn't sick. Then maybe I'd be
able to make myself useful like Marco
and the others too.

rows.label: tlk70000007_03_msg0006
rows.name:
I'd love it I got the chance to do
something for Joey and Teeco...
And Marco, of course!
